scripts.start:dev: cross-env NODE_ENV=development concurrently "npm run backend:dev" "npm run frontend"
scripts.backend:dev: npm run app:dev && npm run db:dev
scripts.app:dev: cd backend && pm2 start app.js --name app
scripts.db:dev: cd backend && pm2 start config/db.js --name db
scripts.start:prod: cross-env NODE_ENV=production concurrently "npm run backend:prod" "npm run frontend"
scripts.backend:prod: npm run app:prod && npm run db:prod
scripts.app:prod: cd backend && pm2 start app.js --name app --env production
scripts.db:prod: cd backend && pm2 start config/db.js --name db --env production
scripts.stop-backend: cd backend && pm2 stop app && pm2 stop db
